result:
Tested 7 properties on sphinxcontrib-mermaid - found 1 bug ✅

**Bug found**: The `class_diagram` function generates invalid Mermaid syntax when Python classes have empty names or contain newline characters. This produces diagrams that fail to render properly. Bug report saved as `bug_report_sphinxcontrib_mermaid_2025-01-18_12-45_x7n2.md`.

tool_input.command: export PATH=/root/hypothesis-llm/envs/sphinxcontrib-mermaid_env/bin:$PATH && python3 -c "import sphinxcontrib.mermaid; print('sphinxcontrib.mermaid imported successfully'); print(sphinxcontrib.mermaid.__file__)"
tool_input.description: Use venv python to import sphinxcontrib.mermaid

tool_input.command: cd /root/hypothesis-llm/envs/sphinxcontrib-mermaid_env && ./bin/python3 -c "import sphinxcontrib.mermaid; print('sphinxcontrib.mermaid imported successfully'); print(sphinxcontrib.mermaid.__file__)"
